name: Dragonchess
description:
Description: Dragonchess is a three-dimensional fantasy chess variant created by Gary Gygax, co-creator of the famed role-playing game Dungeons & Dragons.

Rules can be found here

Features:
- 15 kinds of pieces, some of which have unique abilities you don't remember about till they completely ruin your strategy!
- 3 boards. Surprise your opponent with a sudden attack from above or below!
- Local hot-seat multiplayer. Got 4 moves Scholar's mate from a friend back in the days? Well, here you can win in just two moves and have your vengeance!
- AI as dumb as it can be. Tired of playing against clever friend (or do you just have none?)? Play against the dumbest AI in history of chess, win it in a split second and be proud of yourself for the rest of the day! Tired of playing in general? Grab some popcorn, set a fight between two dummies, and watch as they move pieces around, desperately trying to understand how to play this game!
- Amaizing soundtrack (but just one). Credits to Random Mynd for his awesome music.

Think that this game can be done better? All the source code is here
